entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast late this afternoon. High 9. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Friday 28 April 2023
